site.title: Data Scientist Portfolio | AI Expert | Trilok Nath

hero.name: Trilok Nath
hero.terminal_description: With 6+ years of experience in Data Science and AI Engineering, I specialize in building intelligent systems that solve real-world business problems through advanced analytics and machine learning.

about.bio_intro: I am Trilok Nath, a results-driven Data Scientist with over 6 years of experience in software development and data science. Currently working at IBM in Gurgaon, I specialize in Generative AI, LLMs, Agents, Multimodality, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and other cutting-edge technologies.
about.bio_impact: My professional journey is defined by delivering high-impact solutions that drive business transformation. At IBM, I've:

achievements.description: Led the development of an automated Content Generation System that reduced regulatory approval document processing time by 80%
Contributed to a Chat Virtual Agent that enhanced digital self-service capabilities
Co-developed a Generative AI solution that increased order placement efficiency by 25%

prior_achievements.description: Engineered connectors at Webkul Software that reduced manual data entry time by 50%
Developed web applications at Chadha Industries that reduced operational costs by 20%

entries.description:
- Content Generation System (CGS) : Spearheaded the development of an automated product that cut down regulatory approval document processing time by 80%, reducing it from several months to just a few weeks. Deployed successfully on the client's Azure Cloud, accelerating regulatory workflows.
- Chat Virtual Agent Pilot : Contributed to the development of a Virtual Agent that enhanced digital self-service using WatsonX Assistant and LLMs. Key achievements include a 50% reduction in the number of clicks required to find relevant information on the website, improving user experience and support efficiency.
- GenAI ABCOrder : Co-developed a Generative AI solution that increased order placement efficiency by 25%. Delivered impactful features like automated data extraction, product description enhancements, and a RAG-powered virtual assistant, significantly optimizing the customer experience.

- Engineered connectors that automated the integration of accounting software (FreshBooks, Xero, Zoho) with odoo ERP, reducing manual data entry time by 50% .
- Implemented real-time data synchronization between Odoo ERP and e-commerce platforms (Prestashop), enhancing data accuracy and improving transaction processing speed by 20% .
- Optimized system performance through debugging and feature enhancements, increasing overall platform efficiency by 10% .

- Developed and launched web applications on Azure Cloud, which reduced operational costs by 20% due to optimized cloud resource allocation and performance.
-Customized Odoo ERP modules, leading to 25% improvement in business process efficiency and tailored functionality to meet specific business needs.
-Built and deployed microservices-based web applications, ensuring seamless integration with REST APIs, improving response times and scalability by 30% .

entries.title: AI Content Generation Platform
entries.description: End to End development of an automated product that cut down regulatory approval document processing time by 80%, reducing it from several months to just a few weeks. Deployed successfully on the client's Azure Cloud, accelerating regulatory workflows.

entries.title: SpaceX Falcon 9 First Stage Landing Prediction
entries.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict the landing outcome of SpaceX Falcon 9 first stage using flight data. Achieved an accuracy of 94% by training the model on 1000+ flight records.
entries.expanded_content:
In this capstone, we will predict if the Falcon 9 first stage will land successfully. SpaceX advertises Falcon 9 rocket launches on its website with a cost of 62 million dollars; other providers cost upward of 165 million dollars each, much of the savings is because SpaceX can reuse the first stage.
If we can determine if the first stage will land, we can determine the cost of a launch. This information can be used if an alternate company wants to bid against SpaceX for a rocket launch.

entries.title: Laptop Price Predictor
entries.description: In this project we are creating a laptop Price predictor with the help of Machine Learning Models.
entries.expanded_content:
We have used several Models:
  • Linear Regression
  • Ridge & Lasso
  • SVMRegressor
  • DecisionTreeRegressor
  • RandomForestRegressor
  • Boosting: AdaBoost, Gradient Boost, XGBoost
  • Ensemble: Voting Regressor, Stacking Regressor

footer.description: Turning data into intelligent solutions through innovative AI applications and advanced analytics.
